relevant_findings.HEENT: Sclera anicteric, dry mucous membranes, oropharynx clear.
relevant_findings.neck: Supple, jugular venous pressure not elevated, no lymphadenopathy.
relevant_findings.lungs: Decreased breath sounds at bases bilaterally with crackles midway up back on right side.
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Regular rate and rhythm, normal S1 and S2, systolic ejection murmur, no rubs or gallops.
relevant_findings.abdomen: Soft, non-tender, distended, bowel sounds present, no rebound tenderness or guarding, no organomegaly.
relevant_findings.extremities: Warm, well perfused, 2+ pulses, no clubbing, cyanosis, or edema.
relevant_findings.neurological: Cranial nerves II-XII intact, motor function grossly normal.
